all_example.chinese_example: 委员会进一步鼓励早期预警委员会认真分析与准军事组织以及游击组织有关的风险报告。
all_example.english_example: It further encourages CIAT to analyse carefully the risk reports involving the paramilitaries as well as guerrilla groups

all_example.chinese_example: 可是,寥寥数十名印第安战士却能以游击战术令整支敌军阵脚大乱、进退两难!
all_example.english_example: But a few dozen warriors could tie up a whole enemy army in guerrilla warfare!

all_example.chinese_example: 正如我所说的那样,最终的谈判解决方案的总体轮廓是众所周知的。
all_example.english_example: As I said, the general outlines of a final negotiated solution are well known.

all_example.chinese_example: 委员会建议了应对当前挑战和新出现挑战的战略的大致轮廓。
all_example.english_example: It made suggestions on the general contours of strategies to address current and emerging challenges.

all_example.chinese_example: 我隔着玻璃门看见如山的一堆帽子的轮廓。
all_example.english_example: I saw mountainlike silhouettes of hats through the sliding glass door.

all_example.chinese_example: 报告应为促进有关国家的利益,勾勒出未来协调一致行动的轮廓。
all_example.english_example: This ought to delineate future coordinated and coherent action in the interest of the country concerned

all_example.chinese_example: 信号在一个相关器中受到处理并由计算机程序将其转变为图像或轮廓。
all_example.english_example: The signal is processed in a correlator and computer programs transform it into images or profiles.
which is the thin black line, the contour,

all_example.chinese_example: 获得了三个露头的裂隙和轮廓数据。
all_example.english_example: Data on fractures and lineaments were available for three outcrops.

all_example.chinese_example: 会议的重要活动包括:被命名地域的轮廓(几何形状)和地址的地理编码。
all_example.english_example: Items of interest included defining the footprints, or geometry, of named physical features and the geocoding of addresses

all_example.chinese_example: 组建典型的信息安全网关的办法可以考虑使用转换轮廓图,描述并配置自一个群组到另一个群组的转换。
all_example.english_example: Approaches to forming of typical information security gateways can regard usage of transition profiles describing and configuring transitions from one cluster to another.

all_example.chinese_example: 你们处理了各种数字,提出了预测和预报,建立了模型并勾画了轮廓。
all_example.english_example: You have handled numbers and figures, made projections and forecasts, drawn up models and patterns.

all_example.chinese_example: 过去几年来,我们面临的危险,规模变得更大,轮廓更加明朗。
all_example.english_example: Over the last couple of years, the threat we face has grown larger in scale and sharper in outline.

all_example.chinese_example: 你们处理了各种数字,提出了预测和预报,建立了模型并勾画了轮廓。
all_example.english_example: You have handled numbers and figures, made projections and forecasts, drawn up models and patterns.
